description: ## In Stock User Case 1. Run `node bamazonCustomer.js` 2. Enter the ID of the item you would like to purchase: ![enter-id](/screenshots/enter-id.png?raw=true "User Input of Item ID") 3. Enter the amount you would like to purchase and receive a total price: ![in-stock-results](/screenshots/in-stock-results.png?raw=true "Successful Purchase")
